sentences.en: Andrew began to carve the chicken.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁开始切鸡肉。

sentences.en: Cook pieces of succulent chicken with ample garlic and a little sherry.
sentences.cn: 烹饪鲜美滑嫩的鸡肉时多加些大蒜，并滴入少许雪利酒。

sentences.en: He browned the chicken in a frying pan.
sentences.cn: 他用煎锅把鸡肉煎成焦黄色。

sentences.en: He decided on roast chicken and vegetables, with apple pie to follow.
sentences.cn: 他决定点烤鸡配蔬菜，然后再要一份苹果派。

sentences.en: His chicken eggs sell for $22 a dozen.
sentences.cn: 他的鸡蛋卖22美元一打。

sentences.en: I remember to thaw out the chicken before I leave home.
sentences.cn: 我记着出门前把鸡肉化开。

sentences.en: I'm scared of the dark. I'm a big chicken.
sentences.cn: 我怕黑，是个十足的胆小鬼。

sentences.en: If you casserole chicken pieces, take the skin off first.
sentences.cn: 要是炖鸡块的话，先去掉鸡皮。

sentences.en: Leftover chicken makes a wonderful salad.
sentences.cn: 剩下的鸡肉可做成一盘美味色拉。

sentences.en: Lionel built a coop so that they could raise chickens and have a supply of fresh eggs.
sentences.cn: 莱昂内尔搭建了一个鸡笼，这样他们就可以养鸡，得到新鲜鸡蛋。

sentences.en: Our bodies need some meat, chicken and fish.
sentences.cn: 我们的身体需要一些肉，鸡肉和鱼。

sentences.en: Pour a little of the sauce over the chicken.
sentences.cn: 在鸡肉上浇一点调味汁。

sentences.en: roast chicken
sentences.cn: 烤鸡

sentences.en: She offered Molly tidbits: a chicken drumstick, some cheese.
sentences.cn: 她给了莫莉一些吃的：一根鸡腿下段和一些奶酪。

sentences.en: She scooped the chicken bones back into the stewpot.
sentences.cn: 她拿勺捞起鸡骨头放回了炖锅里。

sentences.en: They tend to buy cheap processed foods like canned chicken and macaroni.
sentences.cn: 他们往往会买便宜的加工食品，像鸡肉罐头和通心粉之类的。

sentences.en: This simple chicken dish costs less than £1 a head.
sentences.cn: 这道简单的鸡肉菜肴每人的花费还不到1英镑。

sentences.en: We need some meat,chicken and fish.
sentences.cn: 我们需要一些肉，鸡肉和鱼。

sentences.en: When the chicken is cooked I'll freeze some.
sentences.cn: 鸡肉做好以后,我会把一部分冷冻起来.

sentences.en: Yes, it tastes like chicken.
sentences.cn: 是的，它的味道像鸡。

phrases.tran_cn: 家禽饲料；极小额的款项；零钱
临阵退缩；[美俚]因害怕而停止做某事

phrases.phrase: don't count your chickens before they're hatched

phrases.tran_cn: 烤鸡；烧鸡；烤油鸡；片皮脆烧鸡

phrases.phrase: running (或 rushing) about like a headless chicken
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)慌如无头小鸡，惊惶失措
n. 童子鸡；年轻人（年轻幼稚的女子）
我们做鸡是对的（肯德基的宣传语）

trans.tran_en: not brave enough to do something
a common farm bird that is kept for its meat and eggs
a common farm bird that is kept for its meat and eggs
